name: ANGRYFISHE
description:
Your submarine breaks, and you have to navigate a cave system to find the parts to repair it!

the twist is, the more you move, the less you see

and a FISHE is hunting you down!

[Play guide - ONLY READ IF YOU ARE STUCK!]

-move with WASD, pause with ESC

-moving will make your camera zoom in,  until you stand still again

-collect 3 pieces of scrap to repair your submarine

-the scrap can be found SE, SW and W of your submarine

- the FISHE will constantly chase you, but will not go through purple barriers. if it can't reach you, it slowly returns to it's 'nest' located on the far SE side of the map.

-once you have enough scrap, enter the door of your sub to win!

(i will also upload a map when itch stops dying)
